source.name: Department of Education Discretionary and Formula Grant Database
source.description: The database contains information on U.S. Department of Education grant and cooperative-agreement awards for the most recent fiscal years.   Five Ways to Search for Grant Awards:   Pick List Search - search for grant awards by selecting (picking) from lists of actual data (up to 10 selections per list).  Text Search - search for awards using a particular text string, such as zip code  Date Search - search for awards made in a date range  Abstract Search - search awards with abstracts  Summary Reports - find summary award information by state and grant program. Also find large dollar individual grants.
